main event: A witness observed a round amber light in the sky that was less bright than a full moon in Durand, Michigan on 27 July 1967.
interesting points: The object was visible for 2-3 minutes,The object made no noise during the sighting,The witness completed a detailed questionnaire about the sighting,The sighting concluded with instructions indicating insufficient data for evaluation,The report included a hand-drawn sketch of the observed object.
